title.text: Extraction system for Personal Attributes Extraction of CLP2014

abstractContent.text: This paper presents the design and implementation of our extraction system for Personal Attributes Extraction in Chinese Text (task 4 of CLP2014).

entities.text: Personal Attributes Extraction in Chinese Text

abstractContent.text: The objective of this task is to extract attribute values of the given personal name.
Our extraction system employs a linguistic analysis following by a dependency patterns matching technique.

introductionContent.text: This is the first year that we take part of in CLP's Personal Attributes Extraction in Chinese Text task.

entities.text: Personal Attributes Extraction in Chinese Text task

introductionContent.text: The goal of this task is to extract specific attributes values of given personals names, such as, birth date, birth city, children, title etc. from the collections of unstructured Chinese texts.
We are required to fill an extracted result into a single attribute slot.
Our approach is based on dependency patterns matching process, which is similar to the works of.
